About the Company: Sar Auto Products Ltd is one of the leading manufacturers of quality assured gears, gear boxes and other transmission components in India, since last 15 years. They were established in 1987. They produce gears conforming to German specification DIN 7 to DIN 9 class of accuracy. They are certified to ISO 9001:200 quality system requirements, from TUV Suddeutschland, in the year 2008. They are located in the state of Gujarat.
